context.title: Changelog for Rule: Video only element has transcript
context.changelog: [{"commit":"fef49b730189c2ab6860fbcaa36641016d11e328","msg":"Make all test asset paths root relative (#887)","date":"1568700536"},{"commit":"3c081053825819f44ecec129e4d835b16c71db4d","msg":"Add many missing links to glossary (#695)","date":"1567495802"},{"commit":"f85fe71424b5665eef47e09ad1662af64e1f8cb3","msg":"chore: run prettier formatting (#866)","date":"1567416919"},{"commit":"67b1ae3503d04ed0667499fc12888cc82d74bc11","msg":"chore: add \"html-hint\" to check validity of examples (#806)","date":"1567408241"},{"commit":"e87fa0696963a2a7f950b35712cc93d9afb56dd7","msg":"fix: update links to WCAG21 resources (#776)","date":"1566375576"},{"commit":"71af6a0dfa82898888bcba743e9d1c700bdf92b8","msg":"Editorial changes (#725)","date":"1566371604"},{"commit":"12d14a9acaa5c5e403fe96f7ec14a8b12a3d2b13","msg":"fix: test if definition for  all referenced glossary terms exist (#634)","date":"1563353169"},{"commit":"c13376dd1d7241b47083e349e7b53aae4e1ab9ac","msg":"Composite rules: Fix broken links in expectations (#627)","date":"1562078377"},{"commit":"1f9f4f088537c8e749eba36c0946601e8e537e6e","msg":"chore: Validating rules frontmatter on CI (#551)","date":"1558173709"},{"commit":"1d7899bd85219c6661aa1600526663a8c922cb9b","msg":"Chore: Adapt site to ACT Rules CR format (#547)","date":"1557402394"},{"commit":"e28c8c011941e46c1736b2d3669479010967e360","msg":"Template update - video only element has transcript (#540)","date":"1557262356"},{"commit":"a289b7510c398fc4366f3cf9d6bfc0bbb0c5529f","msg":"chore: rename files and update associations (#489)","date":"1556526852"},{"commit":"1ddc581088aa696b0875510158f2c57dd37c458a","msg":"chore: add unique id to all rules (#478)","date":"1555411093"},{"commit":"d38ab7e2d621f93aa213b0a151893bf3c9934ab8","msg":"chore: WCAG ACT RULES CG Website Update (#437)","date":"1555317646"},{"commit":"e71f9fbbf9de177da8f99179bcc76402c2188abf","msg":"1.2.1 audio only and video only  (#276)","date":"1547037237"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"ee13b5","name":"Video only element has transcript","rule_type":"atomic","description":"Non-streaming `video` elements without audio must have all visual information available in a transcript.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"],"htmlHintIgnore":["tag-pair"]}
